tool_description: Designs thermal management systems for rocket engines including regenerative cooling channels, heat exchanger sizing, and coolant flow distribution for preventing thermal failures.

chamber_diameter.description: Chamber internal diameter in meters (0.01 to 10.0)

wall_material.description: Wall material: steel, inconel, copper, carbon_composite

coolant_type.description: Coolant fluid: fuel, water, liquid_nitrogen, helium

cooling_method.description: Cooling approach: regenerative, radiative, ablative, dump

heat_flux_chamber.description: Heat flux in chamber region in MW/m² (0.1 to 100.0)

heat_flux_throat.description: Heat flux in throat region in MW/m² (0.1 to 200.0)

coolant_inlet_temperature.description: Coolant inlet temperature in Kelvin (50 to 500)

coolant_pressure.description: Coolant supply pressure in bar (1.0 to 500.0)

error_messages: Chamber diameter out of range: Value must be between 0.01 and 10.0 meters
Chamber length out of range: Value must be between 0.01 and 20.0 meters
Nozzle length out of range: Value must be between 0.01 and 50.0 meters
Invalid wall material: Must be one of [steel, inconel, copper, carbon_composite]
Invalid coolant type: Must be one of [fuel, water, liquid_nitrogen, helium]
Invalid cooling method: Must be one of [regenerative, radiative, ablative, dump]
Heat flux out of range: Chamber heat flux must be 0.1-100.0 MW/m², throat heat flux must be 0.1-200.0 MW/m²
Coolant temperature out of range: Value must be between 50 and 500 Kelvin
Coolant pressure out of range: Value must be between 1.0 and 500.0 bar
Channel count out of range: Value must be between 10 and 1000 channels
usage: Provide chamber geometry (chamber_diameter, chamber_length, nozzle_length), material properties (wall_material), cooling configuration (coolant_type, cooling_method), and thermal loads (heat_flux_chamber, heat_flux_throat). Optionally specify coolant conditions and channel_count.

coolant_mass_flow.description: Required coolant mass flow rate in kg/s

coolant_velocity.description: Coolant velocity in channels in m/s

pressure_drop.description: Coolant pressure drop across system in bar

wall_temperature_max.description: Maximum predicted wall temperature in Kelvin
